message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $14,500, which I believe reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $14,500 is already a competitive price for this product. To meet you halfway, I can do $13,250. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
